title: No hextech chests

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I haven't gotten any chests, i have earned 4 s ranks this week, (one with zed, 3 with yasuo, i own the champs), but no chests, i havent played with any premade where i could get a chest from, they are all in normal blind picks, any help would be appreciated! (the link is my last game, i got an s+ with zed)

replies.body: Keep in mind that you can only get one chest from each champion per season, this might be the reason why you didn't get a chest with that Yasuo game. You also only have 4 available chest slots at any given time, and earning a chest will use one up. They come back after 7 days though!
